title: The MHR Search Summary Results List Schema

mhrNumber.description: Unique manufactured home registration number assigned by the Manufactured Home Registry.

status.description: The status of a manufactured home registration: one of ACTIVE, EXEMPT, or HISTORIC.

createDateTime.description: Generated by the MHR system, the date and time the registration is created.

homeLocation.description: The physical location of the manufactured home (city).

organizationName.description: The name of the organzation associated with the manufactured home.

serialNumber.description: Serial number of the first manufactured home section.

selected.description: Set to true to specify the match is to be included in the search detail results (search step 2).

includeLienInfo.description: Set to true to specify PPR information associated with the MHR number is to be included in the search detail results (search step 2). The default is false.
